about.me: As an independent stake pool operator it is my goal to educate people about Cardano and true decentralisation by providing educational content through the Armada Alliance platform (armada-alliance.com).
about.server: Running on low power consuming ARM-based devices (Raspberry Pis & Apple SOC) with an average pool energy consumption of less than 40 WattsðŸ’¡, always online, 100MB up/down, solar energy. Margin stays 1%.
